title: Question 3
prompt: Which would be the best topic sentence to add at the beginning of paragraph B?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
A topic sentence gives the main idea of a paragraph. This paragraph explains the difference between first degree, second degree, and third degree burns, so the topic sentence should introduce the three levels of severity of burns.


Burns are classified into three levels of severity, known as first degree, second degree, and third degree. In First Degree burns, only the top layer of skin is injured, and the symptoms are redness and pain. Second degree burns affect deeper layers of skin and are characterized by swelling and blisters. Third degree burns destroy all layers of the skin and harm underlying tissue.
